meanings.sent1: The pond looked toadless without any hopping amphibians.
meanings.sent2: The garden felt toadless after the toads migrated to a new habitat.
meanings.sent3: The toadless garden seemed oddly quiet without the croaking sounds.
meanings.sent4: The toadless landscape felt empty, missing the familiar presence of the amphibians.
meanings.sent5: The toadless environment was strangely serene without the usual croaks and jumps.

meanings.sent1: The forest appeared toadless, with no signs of the amphibians around.
meanings.sent2: The backyard seemed toadless ever since the toads found a new home.
meanings.sent3: The toadless pond made the frogs wonder where their toad friends had gone.
meanings.sent4: The toadless area felt desolate, lacking the usual presence of the hopping creatures.
meanings.sent5: The toadless field was eerily quiet without the croaks of the amphibians.
